definition: to possess/to be occupied or burdened with (work, a contract, a lawsuit)

to remove/to take off/to strip off/to discard/to shed/to come off/to fall off
the back (human anatomy)/the back part of sth
knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
